articles.author: Tunis Business School
articles.title: DAAD Scholarship for Double Degree at Heilbronn University
articles.description: A call for graduating seniors majoring in marketing or finance at TBS to apply for a partial scholarship.
articles.content: This call is for graduating seniors majoring in marketing or finance. The applicant must be aware that this is a partial scholarship. The selected candidate needs to provide personal financial proof for an additional 600‚Ç¨ per month. Deadline: May 13, 2025. Applications must be submitted by email to: anja.chan@hs-heilbronn.de

articles.author: TBS Junior Entreprise
articles.title: HexIdeate 2.0
articles.description: In the quest of elevating your ideas to the next level, you will be competing for grand prizes and exclusive opportunities.
articles.content:
Get ready for 36 hours of creativity, collaboration, and entrepreneurship at HexIdeate 2.0.
This event is your opportunity to tackle real world challenges, collaborate with like-minded innovators, and transform bold ideas into actionable solutions.
Throughout the journey, you‚Äôll engage in intensive ideation workshops, mentorship sessions, and get hands-on experiences that will sharpen your problem solving and strategic thinking skills.
In the quest of elevating your ideas to the next level, you will be competing for grand prizes and exclusive opportunities. 📈
📅 Join us on the 26th and 27th of April.
📍 At Universit√© Paris Dauphine Tunis!
💡 To any young mind with a drive, this is your one way ticket to make an impact.
Spark Innovation, through Ideation!

articles.author: TBS Junior Entreprise
articles.title: Speak Palestine
articles.description: Together, We Raise Awareness for the Palestinian Cause!
articles.content:
🌟 Join Us for a Powerful Evening 🌟
🤝 TBS Clubs and UGTE TBS Unite for Palestine 🤝
📅 Date: 08 may 2024
‚è∞ Time: 1:30 pm
📍 Location: Tunis Business School
🌍 Together, We Raise Awareness for the Palestinian Cause! 🌍
Join us as we come together to stand in solidarity with Palestine. TBS clubs and UGTE are collaborating to raise awareness about the ongoing struggles faced by the Palestinian people. Through engaging discussions, impactful presentations, and workshops .we aim to foster understanding, empathy, and support.
🔗 Stay tuned for more details and registration information!

articles.content:

articles.author: ATLAS TBS
articles.title: The Dragons' Den
articles.description: Dare to Dream. Bold Enough to Pitch? Witness the Future Unfold.
articles.content:
Welcome to Dragon‚Äôs Den. 🐉🔥
Where Innovation Ignites Opportunity.
Dare to Dream. Bold Enough to Pitch? Witness the Future Unfold.
Step into the spotlight of Dragon‚Äôs Den, where the brightest minds and boldest ideas come to life in a high-stakes pitch event like no other.
Inspired by the iconic TV series, this powerful showcase brings together top talent from our Fintech Hackathon and rising startups to present their visionary projects to a panel of elite ‚ÄúDragons‚Äù ‚Äî seasoned investors, industry titans, and renowned entrepreneurs.
Why should you be there?
‚öî️ Experience the thrill of live pitches and fierce competition
‚öô️ Discover groundbreaking ideas that could shape tomorrow‚Äôs tech

Whether you're an entrepreneur, a student, a professional, or just curious, this is your chance to be part of something extraordinary.
🗓️ Date: May 14, 2025
📍 Location: Tunis Business School
💡 Theme: Pitches. Passion. Possibilities.
Join us. Be inspired. Witness greatness.
Dragon‚Äôs Den awaits‚Ä¶ are you in?🔥

articles.author: TIMUN TBS
articles.title: MWTO 9th Edition
articles.description: Are you ready to harness the arcane forces of diplomacy and trade, weaving spells of negotiation and strategy in the grand arena of global commerce?
articles.content:
Are you ready to harness the arcane forces of diplomacy and trade, weaving spells of negotiation and strategy in the grand arena of global commerce? ‚ú®🔮 The *9th Edition* of the *Model World Trade Organization (MWTO) 🇺🇳*, a legendary simulation forged by *TIMUN TBS*, is summoning the most formidable minds once again!
From the *21st to the 23rd of February*, the halls of *Tunis Business School* shall transform into a battleground where words hold power and trade shapes empires. ‚öñ️💼 Sharpen your rhetoric, channel your diplomatic prowess, and prepare to engage in high-stakes debates where every decision can tip the scales of fate. 🏆
Honorable delegates and revered scribes, stand firm for your nations, wield the magic of diplomacy, and let your voices shape the course of trade‚Äôs destiny. 🏰🪄
The ancient scroll awaits your name , will you answer the call? 📜
